_metadata.course_description: The course will review different topics related to risk modeling and management, specifically in line with Financial Risk Manager (FRM) Parts I and II (mainly Part I).
learning_outcomes: use statistical analysis of financial data for risk pricing and management
understand different types of asset classes and derivatives
identify different types of risk such as model, market, and credit
apply derivatives for linear and non-linear risk management
prerequisites: A quantitative background is assumed, i.e. knowledge of probability, statistics, and calculus.
Knowledge in programming would be extremely helpful.
